section.title: Ubuntu 12.04.1 LTS 安装
section.screen: $ sudo apt-get install postgresql
$ sudo passwd postgres Enter new UNIX password: Retype new UNIX password: passwd: password updated successfully
$ su - postgres Password: Added user postgres.
section.para: 进入psql客户款, PostgreSQL的psql命令相当于sqlplus,mysql命令
section.screen:
$ psql psql (9.1.6) Type "help" for help.
postgres=#
postgres=# \q

section.title: PostgreSQL YUM 源安装
section.para: CentOS 6.4 环境 YUM 地址 http://yum.postgresql.org/

section.screen:
# yum install http://yum.postgresql.org/9.2/redhat/rhel-6-x86_64/pgdg-centos92-9.2-6.noarch.rpm # yum list postgres*
# yum install postgresql92-server postgresql92
chkconfig postgresql-9.2 on service postgresql-9.2 initdb service postgresql-9.2 start
# ls /var/lib/pgsql/9.2/data/*.conf /var/lib/pgsql/9.2/data/pg_hba.conf /var/lib/pgsql/9.2/data/pg_ident.conf /var/lib/pgsql/9.2/data/postgresql.conf
# yum install http://yum.postgresql.org/9.3/redhat/rhel-6-x86_64/pgdg-centos93-9.3-1.noarch.rpm # yum install postgresql93-server postgresql93
# chkconfig postgresql-9.3 on # service postgresql-9.3 initdb # service postgresql-9.3 start
# su - postgres $ pg_dump -f wechat.sql wechat

# chkconfig postgresql-9.2 off # service postgresql-9.2 stop
# service postgresql-9.3 start
# su - postgres $ createuser -r -s -P dba $ createuser -P wechat $ createdb -E UTF8 -O wechat wechat $ cat wechat.sql | psql wechat
section.para: 注意 vimdiff 命令是文件对比于合并工具，建议你选择你比较熟悉的工具。
section.screen: # service postgresql-9.3 restart

section.title: PostgreSQL 配置
section.screen: $ su - postgres Password: $ pwd /var/lib/postgresql $
section.para: 备份配置文件，防止修改过程中损毁
section.screen: cp /etc/postgresql/9.1/main/postgresql.conf /etc/postgresql/9.1/main/postgresql.conf.original cp /etc/postgresql/9.1/main/pg_hba.conf /etc/postgresql/9.1/main/pg_hba.conf.original

section.title: postgresql.conf
section.para: 启用tcp/ip连接，去掉下面注释,修改为你需要的IP地址，默认为localhost
section.screen: listen_addresses = 'localhost'
section.para: 如果有多个网络适配器可以指定 'ip' 或 '*' 任何接口上的IP地址都可能listen.
section.screen:
$ sudo vim /etc/postgresql/9.1/main/postgresql.conf
listen_addresses = '*'

section.title: pg_hba.conf
section.para: pg_hba.conf配置文件的权限需要注意以下，-rw-r----- 1 postgres postgres 4649 Dec 5 18:00 pg_hba.conf
section.screen: $ ll /etc/postgresql/9.1/main/ total 52 drwxr-xr-x 2 postgres postgres 4096 Dec 6 09:40 ./ drwxr-xr-x 3 postgres postgres 4096 Dec 5 18:00 ../ -rw-r--r-- 1 postgres postgres 316 Dec 5 18:00 environment -rw-r--r-- 1 postgres postgres 143 Dec 5 18:00 pg_ctl.conf -rw-r----- 1 postgres postgres 4649 Dec 5 18:00 pg_hba.conf -rw-r----- 1 postgres postgres 1636 Dec 5 18:00 pg_ident.conf -rw-r--r-- 1 postgres postgres 19259 Dec 5 18:00 postgresql.conf -rw-r--r-- 1 postgres postgres 378 Dec 5 18:00 start.conf
section.para: pg_hba.conf配置文件负责访问权限控制
section.screen:
# TYPE DATABASE USER ADDRESS METHOD
# "local" is for Unix domain socket connections only local all all peer # IPv4 local connections: host all all 127.0.0.1/32 md5 # IPv6 local connections: host all all ::1/128 md5

glossdef.para: local 本地使用unix/socket 方式连接, host 使用tcp/ip socket 方式连接
允许连接的IP地址，可以使用子网掩码.

section.para: 下面我们做一个简单测试，首先配置pg_hba。conf文件
section.screen: $ sudo vi /etc/postgresql/9.1/main/pg_hba.conf host * dba 0.0.0.0/0 md5 host test test 0.0.0.0/0 md5
section.para: 运行创建数据,用户 的SQL语句
section.screen:
CREATE ROLE test LOGIN PASSWORD 'test' NOSUPERUSER NOINHERIT NOCREATEDB NOCREATEROLE;
CREATE DATABASE test WITH OWNER = test ENCODING = 'UTF8' TABLESPACE = pg_default;

$ psql psql (9.1.6) Type "help" for help.
postgres=# CREATE ROLE test LOGIN PASSWORD 'test' NOSUPERUSER NOINHERIT NOCREATEDB NOCREATEROLE; CREATE ROLE postgres=# CREATE DATABASE test WITH OWNER = test ENCODING = 'UTF8' TABLESPACE = pg_default; CREATE DATABASE postgres=# \q

$ psql -hlocalhost -Utest test Password for user test: psql (9.1.6) SSL connection (cipher: DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA, bits: 256) Type "help" for help.
test=> \l List of databases Name | Owner | Encoding | Collate | Ctype | Access privileges -----------+----------+----------+-------------+-------------+----------------------- postgres | postgres | UTF8 | en_US.UTF-8 | en_US.UTF-8 | template0 | postgres | UTF8 | en_US.UTF-8 | en_US.UTF-8 | =c/postgres + | | | | | postgres=CTc/postgres template1 | postgres | UTF8 | en_US.UTF-8 | en_US.UTF-8 | =c/postgres + | | | | | postgres=CTc/postgres test | test | UTF8 | en_US.UTF-8 | en_US.UTF-8 | (4 rows)
test=>

section.title: 创建dba用户
section.para: 创建一个远程维护数据库dba用户，具有创建数据库与创建用户的权限
section.screen: CREATE USER dba PASSWORD 'dba' CREATEDB CREATEUSER;

$ psql psql (9.1.6) Type "help" for help.
postgres=# CREATE USER dba PASSWORD 'dba' CREATEDB CREATEUSER; CREATE ROLE postgres=# \q

$ psql -hlocalhost -Udba postgres Password for user dba: psql (9.1.6) SSL connection (cipher: DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA, bits: 256) Type "help" for help.
postgres=#
